name: Linkz.ai – Automatic link previews on hover
author: Linkz.ai

sections.description:
Linkz.ai improves visitor retention on your website & blog with live link previews. Linkz.ai automatically extracts & shows linked content, e.g. videos, presentations, articles, blog posts & 1000+ web embeds within your website.

💬 Live link preview on hover
As users hover over a link, a pop-up appears, offering a summary of the linked content, from articles and blog posts to videos and presentations. Keeps your audience engaged and informed in real-time.

📺 Rich link previews on click
With rich link previews, when visitors click on a hyperlink, Linkz.ai will extract & show linked rich media content inside your website. Rich link previews are supported for YouTube, TikTok, Typeform, Prezi & 1000+ websites. Learn more →

📰 Article link previews on click
Linkz.ai extracts & shows text content for hyperlinks pointing to third-party articles, blog posts, guides and other content. You will keep visitors on your website and save them from the tab-overload. Learn more →

📄 Integrated PDF-viewer & file-viewer
Automatically transform hyperlinks to download files into immersive file previews with a file viewer integrated within your website, increasing the time spent on your site. Learn more →

📊 Link preview analytics
Explore the most previewed & trending links on your website and correct broken links.

More from Linkz.ai:

  • 📱 Mobile-friendly link auto-previews
  • 💻 Control where on a website to display live link previews
  • 🎨 Themes
  • 🌙 Auto light/dark mode
  • 🛠 2-minute installation
sections.faq:
Can I use Linkz.ai for free?

Yes, absolutely! You have a free link preview quota every month.

What are the premium features?

Premium features give, you higher link preview quotas, analytics and custom styles. Learn more about plans.
sections.changelog:
1.1.5

  • Re-engineered script for performance & speed
  • Article preview on click
  • File preview on click
  • New themes
  • Compatibility with the latest WrdPress version

1.0

  • Welcome Linkz.ai for WordPress
  • Install Linkz.ai without leaving WordPress
sections.screenshots:
1. Preview any link on hover

  2. Preview videos, presentations, articles, blog posts, files & 1000+ web embeds

  3. Explore the most previewed links on your website
sections.reviews:
Well implemented version of link previews and great support

By Robin (robin ho) on March 26, 2024

Very good plugin. Highly recommended.

Free version is excellent and fully functional, however the paid version really elevates it with the modals so a user doesn't leave the page to read or scan the page/article a link may be pointing too without loading a whole new tab.

Support is incredible, and some of the most responsive I've ever had for a wordpress plugin. Many thanks Vittorio!

Helpful Plugin

By impickletaylor on January 17, 2023

I'm a fan of Linkz.ai. Easy to setup and adds great functionality. Helpful in encouraging my users to stay on my site.

Great plugin for user engagement!

By tavletti on January 2, 2023

After a simple setup, it just works, adding preview popups to external links I had on my blog. Have no impact on performance (at least I didn't notice any) and no issues with capability. Totally liked!
